ThreadedJobCourier Class Reference

This courier takes a job and process it in the background, in a thread. More...

#include <ThreadedJobCourier.h>

Detailed Description

This courier takes a job and process it in the background, in a thread.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ThreadedJobCourier::ThreadedJobCourier (  ISABThreadGroupHandle  threadGroup,
Processor *  proc,
ReplyQueue &  replyQueue,
uint32  threadIndex,
const PacketQueue &  receiveQueue
) 
 

Setup job courier work.

Parameters:
threadGroup The group that the work thread should belong to.
proc The one that does the real work. It will be deleted by this instance.
replyQueue The works progress will be put in this queue.

void ThreadedJobCourier::takeJob (  Packet *  job,
JobReply &  reply,
bool  urget = false
)  [virtual]
 

Take a job and return directly.

If you add a job without waiting for the current job to finish, you will get a memory leak.

See also:
JobCourier::takeJob(Packet,bool)

Reimplemented from JobCourier.
